title: The Parable of the Coal
description: A short story to help people not judge others until they have walked in their shoes or seen with their eyes. This touching inspirational story reveals true friendship and a message to not give up on others who hold a grudge or are angry at what life has brought them. Its lasting message is that unselfish love and service come with great and eternal rewards. True friendship often comes by the amount of service you render to those whom you would least expect.
author: Matthew H. Swan
